CORAL Component documentation: CoralBase
Ioannis Papadopoulos CERN
e-mail:Ioannis.Papadopoulos@cern.ch
October 2005
Introduction Purpose of the component
This component defines a few C++ types mapping to special SQL types (Blob, Date, TimeStamp) and the AttributeList class, which is the main data placeholder in the CORAL public API.
Known problems and restrictions
The Blobs can hold binary data that fit entirely in the memory available by the operating system. The AttributeList may hold variables of primitive C++ types, std::string types and the coral::Blob, coral::Date and coral::TimeStamp types.
